Question: This person is married to Margot Birmingham; they have five children (Ross Jr., Nancy, Suzanne, Carolyn, and Katherine).
Hints: In January 2008, this person publicly came out against Republican candidate John McCain and endorsed Mitt Romney for President.
At one point in June, this person led the polls with 39% (versus 31% for Bush and 25% for Clinton).
In the 1986 miniseries, this person was portrayed by Richard Crenna.
